articles.author: Michaela Zee
articles.title: ‘Schitt’s Creek’ Cast Reacts to Catherine O’Hara’s Death: ‘It’s Hard to Imagine a World Without Her in It’ - Variety
articles.description: The cast of 'Schitt's Creek' including Eugene Levy are mourning Catherine O'Hara, who died Jan. 30 following a brief illness. She was 71.
articles.content:
The cast of “Schitt’s Creek” are mourning the loss of Catherine O’Hara, who died Jan. 30 following a brief illness. She was 71. 
O’Hara portrayed exuberant matriach Moira Rose on the Canadian sitcom… [+3127 chars]

articles.title: Six Takeaways From ‘Melania,’ Amazon MGM’s Documentary About The First Lady - Deadline
articles.description: The documentary Melania has candid moments, but it isn't particularly revelatory about her life and background.
articles.content:
Melania,Amazon MGM Studios‘ documentary about Melania Trump, is billed as a behind-the-scenes look at the once-and-future first lady in the 20 days leading up to the inauguration last year.
